engChrName: Wait!
engSearchText: Wait!
jpnChrName: 待ってくれ……！
jpnSearchText: 待ってくれ……！

engChrName: Albert, Odette!
engSearchText: Albert, Odette!
jpnChrName: アルベール君、オデットも……！？
jpnSearchText: アルベール君、オデットも……！？

engChrName: What are you two doing here?
engSearchText: What are you two doing here?
jpnChrName: ふ、二人ともどうして……
jpnSearchText: ふ、二人ともどうして……

engChrName: Renne texted us. She said the two of you will be absent for the next three days.
engSearchText:
Renne texted us. She said the two of you will be
absent for the next three days.
jpnChrName: ……レン先輩からのメールで 君と先輩が３日ほど欠席すると聞いた。
jpnSearchText:
……レン先輩からのメールで
君と先輩が３日ほど欠席すると聞いた。

engChrName: As soon as I got her message, I woke up Odette, and we called a cab and got here as fast as possible.
engSearchText:
As soon as I got her message, I woke up Odette, and
we called a cab and got here as fast as possible.
jpnChrName: それでオデットを叩き起こして タクシーでここまで駆け付けたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでオデットを叩き起こして
タクシーでここまで駆け付けたんだ。

engChrName: Most trains aren't running at this hour, so that was really our only option.
engSearchText:
Most trains aren't running at this hour, so that was
really our only option.
jpnChrName: 地下鉄も少なかったからさ～。 ……でもビンゴだったみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
地下鉄も少なかったからさ～。
……でもビンゴだったみたいだね。

engChrName: Now, then. Where exactly are you going this early, hmm? Off on another thrilling adventure with that scoundrel and his shady entourage?
engSearchText:
Now, then. Where exactly are you going this
early, hmm? Off on another thrilling adventure with
that scoundrel and his shady entourage?
jpnChrName: このタイミングでの出張ってことは、 またバーゼルの時のような──
jpnSearchText:
このタイミングでの出張ってことは、
またバーゼルの時のような──

engChrName: If you keep throwing yourself into danger, one day you'll wind up getting hurt—or worse.
engSearchText:
If you keep throwing yourself into danger, one day
you'll wind up getting hurt—or worse.
jpnChrName: いや、それ以上に危険なことに 首を突っ込もうとしてるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
いや、それ以上に危険なことに
首を突っ込もうとしてるみたいだな？

engChrName: I'm sorry for worrying you both. I should have told you sooner.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry for worrying you both. I should have told
you sooner.
jpnChrName: ………ごめんなさい、黙っていて。
jpnSearchText: ………ごめんなさい、黙っていて。

engChrName: I can't promise it won't be dangerous, but I have to do th—
engSearchText:
I can't promise it won't be dangerous, but I have to do
th—
jpnChrName: 危なくないとは言えません、 でもどうか行かせて──
jpnSearchText:
危なくないとは言えません、
でもどうか行かせて──

engChrName: No! You don't HAVE to do anything!
engSearchText: No! You don't HAVE to do anything!
jpnChrName: ダメだよっ──！ 今回はいくらなんでも！！
jpnSearchText:
ダメだよっ──！
今回はいくらなんでも！！

engChrName: I don't want to lose you! I mean, look at what happened to Creil!
engSearchText:
I don't want to lose you! I mean, look at what
happened to Creil!
jpnChrName: クレイユであんな事が あったばかりなんだよ……！？
jpnSearchText:
クレイユであんな事が
あったばかりなんだよ……！？

engChrName: I know you put a lot of pressure on yourself because of your family...
engSearchText:
I know you put a lot of pressure on yourself because
of your family...
jpnChrName: あんたが“家族”のことで 色々抱えているのは知ってるけど──
jpnSearchText:
あんたが“家族”のことで
色々抱えているのは知ってるけど──

engChrName: ...but if that's your only reason—if you're just risking your life for your dad's sake, then— then I won't let you go!
engSearchText:
...but if that's your only reason—if you're just
risking your life for your dad's sake, then—
then I won't let you go!
jpnChrName: それが理由なら 断固反対なんだからね！？
jpnSearchText:
それが理由なら
断固反対なんだからね！？

engChrName: Odette...
engSearchText: Odette...
jpnChrName: ……オデット………
jpnSearchText: ……オデット………

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: I'll admit that I'm doing this in part because of Dad...
engSearchText: I'll admit that I'm doing this in part because of Dad...
jpnChrName: ……理由は色々あります。 お父さんのことは勿論、それ以外も。
jpnSearchText:
……理由は色々あります。
お父さんのことは勿論、それ以外も。

engChrName: ...but that's not my only reason.
engSearchText: ...but that's not my only reason.
jpnChrName: でも──それだけじゃないんです。
jpnSearchText: でも──それだけじゃないんです。

engChrName: Ever since I started this job, I've been exposed to people of all walks of life, I've accumulated a wealth of important life experiences...
engSearchText:
Ever since I started this job, I've been exposed to
people of all walks of life, I've accumulated a wealth
of important life experiences...
jpnChrName: この“バイト”を始めて色々な人と 知り合って、色々なことを知って……
jpnSearchText:
この“バイト”を始めて色々な人と
知り合って、色々なことを知って……

engChrName: ...and I've felt closer to my mother and grandmother than ever before through the things they left behind.
engSearchText:
...and I've felt closer to my mother and grandmother
than ever before through the things they left behind.
jpnChrName: 受け継いだものを通じてお母さんや お祖母ちゃんとの“絆”も感じて。
jpnSearchText:
受け継いだものを通じてお母さんや
お祖母ちゃんとの“絆”も感じて。

engChrName: It's all become just as vital to my growth as our day-to-day lessons at Aramis.
engSearchText:
It's all become just as vital to my growth as our
day-to-day lessons at Aramis.
jpnChrName: ２人やレン先輩もいるアラミスに入って、 学び続けていることも含めて──
jpnSearchText:
２人やレン先輩もいるアラミスに入って、
学び続けていることも含めて──

engChrName: I'd even go as far as to say it's become an inseparable part of who I am.
engSearchText:
I'd even go as far as to say it's become an inseparable
part of who I am.
jpnChrName: 全てが“今の自分”に 繋がっていると実感できたんです。
jpnSearchText:
全てが“今の自分”に
繋がっていると実感できたんです。

engChrName: So please, don't try and stop me.
engSearchText: So please, don't try and stop me.
jpnChrName: だから、どうか行かせてください。
jpnSearchText: だから、どうか行かせてください。

engChrName: I'm not just going because of my family—or because of what they passed down to me.
engSearchText:
I'm not just going because of my family—or because
of what they passed down to me.
jpnChrName: 家族の事情でも、 受け継いだ物のためでもなく──
jpnSearchText:
家族の事情でも、
受け継いだ物のためでもなく──

engChrName: I'm going because this is something that I have to do for myself.
engSearchText:
I'm going because this is something that I have to do
for myself.
jpnChrName: 今の私にしかできないことをやるために。
jpnSearchText: 今の私にしかできないことをやるために。
っ……

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエス……
jpnSearchText: アニエス……

engChrName: Ah!
engSearchText: Ah!

engChrName: Whose car is that?
engSearchText: Whose car is that?
jpnChrName: この車は……
jpnSearchText: この車は……

engChrName: You're certainly up bright and early. About to depart, I take it?
engSearchText:
You're certainly up bright and early. About to depart,
I take it?
jpnChrName: 早いな──解決屋諸君。 ちょうど出発するところだったか。
jpnSearchText:
早いな──解決屋諸君。
ちょうど出発するところだったか。

engChrName: René.
engSearchText: René.
jpnChrName: ルネ……
jpnSearchText: ルネ……

engChrName: The hell's he doing here?
engSearchText: The hell's he doing here?
jpnChrName: なんでスカシ眼鏡が──
jpnSearchText: なんでスカシ眼鏡が──

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?

engChrName: What? Him?!
engSearchText: What? Him?!
jpnChrName: なああっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>なああっ！？

engChrName: (That's the guy who's always on the city screens.)
engSearchText: (That's the guy who's always on the city screens.)
jpnChrName: （街頭ビジョンでよく見る……）
jpnSearchText: （街頭ビジョンでよく見る……）

engChrName: Dad...
engSearchText: Dad...
jpnChrName: ……お父さん…………
jpnSearchText: ……お父さん…………

engChrName: One must always be responsible when making critical decisions—and be acutely aware of their potential repercussions.
engSearchText:
One must always be responsible when making critical
decisions—and be acutely aware of their
potential repercussions.
jpnChrName: ──分かっているだろうが “決断”には“責任”がつきまとう。
jpnSearchText:
──分かっているだろうが
“決断”には“責任”がつきまとう。

engChrName: I pray you took that into careful consideration when making yours, Agnès.
engSearchText:
I pray you took that into careful consideration when
making yours, Agnès.
jpnChrName: それを踏まえての行動だろうな、アニエス？
jpnSearchText: それを踏まえての行動だろうな、アニエス？

engChrName: Of course I did. I am my father's daughter, after all.
engSearchText: Of course I did. I am my father's daughter, after all.
jpnChrName: ──はい。 これでもお父さんの娘ですから。
jpnSearchText:
──はい。
これでもお父さんの娘ですから。

engChrName: I fully intend to seize every opportunity to broaden my horizons and learn from my collective experiences.
engSearchText:
I fully intend to seize every opportunity to broaden
my horizons and learn from my collective experiences.
jpnChrName: あらゆる機会を無駄にせずに 見聞を広め、自らの糧としてきます。
jpnSearchText:
あらゆる機会を無駄にせずに
見聞を広め、自らの糧としてきます。

engChrName: As much as it pains me to admit, I can't promise that I'll return safe and sound...
engSearchText:
As much as it pains me to admit, I can't promise that
I'll return safe and sound...
jpnChrName: 絶対に無事に戻ってくる…… なんて軽々しくは言えませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
絶対に無事に戻ってくる……
なんて軽々しくは言えませんけど。

engChrName: ...but I can promise that I'll spare no effort to do so. The last thing I want is to sadden you and the friends I love so dearly.
engSearchText:
...but I can promise that I'll spare no effort to do so.
The last thing I want is to sadden you and the friends
I love so dearly.
jpnChrName: 大切な友達とお父さんを哀しませないよう 最大限、努力します。
jpnSearchText:
大切な友達とお父さんを哀しませないよう
最大限、努力します。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: ……アニエス……
jpnSearchText: ……アニエス……
…………………………

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnSearchText: フ……

engChrName: Very well. Make the most of your connections while you're away. The CID is at your beck and call.
engSearchText:
Very well. Make the most of your connections while
you're away. The CID is at your beck and call.
jpnChrName: ──ＣＩＤや各方面との ツテはせいぜい活用することだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ＣＩＤや各方面との
ツテはせいぜい活用することだ。

engChrName: There are many truths that lie dormant in the gap between ideals and reality. You would do well to seek them out.
engSearchText:
There are many truths that lie dormant in the gap
between ideals and reality. You would do well to seek
them out.
jpnChrName: 理想と現実の狭間の中、 自分が何を掴めるかを測る意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
理想と現実の狭間の中、
自分が何を掴めるかを測る意味でも。
あ……

engChrName: I will cover for you with regards to your absence from Aramis.
engSearchText:
I will cover for you with regards to your absence
from Aramis.
jpnChrName: 欠席理由については 私の方からもフォローしておく。
jpnSearchText:
欠席理由については
私の方からもフォローしておく。

engChrName: You have three days. No more, no less. If you exceed that, I will send in the army.
engSearchText:
You have three days. No more, no less. If you exceed
that, I will send in the army.
jpnChrName: だが３日が限度だ── それ以上は軍の部隊を派遣する。
jpnSearchText:
だが３日が限度だ──
それ以上は軍の部隊を派遣する。

engChrName: That is as far as I'm willing to compromise.
engSearchText: That is as far as I'm willing to compromise.
jpnChrName: これが私からの最大限の譲歩だ。
jpnSearchText: これが私からの最大限の譲歩だ。

engChrName: That's more than enough. Thank you, Dad.
engSearchText: That's more than enough. Thank you, Dad.
jpnChrName: 十分です──ありがとうお父さん。
jpnSearchText: 十分です──ありがとうお父さん。

engChrName: I entrust my daughter into your care, Arkride.
engSearchText: I entrust my daughter into your care, Arkride.
jpnChrName: 改めてになるが、娘が世話になっている。
jpnSearchText: 改めてになるが、娘が世話になっている。

engChrName: You would do well to utilize her services to the fullest.
engSearchText: You would do well to utilize her services to the fullest.
jpnChrName: 君たちの“流儀”の範疇内で存分に コキ使ってやってくれ、アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText:
君たちの“流儀”の範疇内で存分に
コキ使ってやってくれ、アークライド所長。

engChrName: I see you've gathered a retinue of assistants and associates. I am depending on you all to keep her safe from harm.
engSearchText:
I see you've gathered a retinue of assistants
and associates. I am depending on you all to keep her
safe from harm.
jpnChrName: ──頼もしき助力者もいるようだし、 ある程度の安全確保も期待したい所だが。
jpnSearchText:
──頼もしき助力者もいるようだし、
ある程度の安全確保も期待したい所だが。

engChrName: No need to worry, Mr. Prez. Your girl's in good hands.
engSearchText:
No need to worry, Mr. Prez. Your girl's in
good hands.
jpnChrName: ええ……任せてください。
jpnSearchText: ええ……任せてください。

engChrName: We may skirt the rules of society from time to time, but we ain't about to break any labor laws.
engSearchText:
We may skirt the rules of society from time to time,
but we ain't about to break any labor laws.
jpnChrName: ウチはグレーだが、労働環境は ブラックじゃないつもりなんでね。
jpnSearchText:
ウチはグレーだが、労働環境は
ブラックじゃないつもりなんでね。

engChrName: I, too, will do all I can to ensure the safety of everyone here.
engSearchText:
I, too, will do all I can to ensure the safety of
everyone here.
jpnChrName: ──ご息女のみならず 微力を尽くさせていただこう。
jpnSearchText:
──ご息女のみならず
微力を尽くさせていただこう。

engChrName: Heheh. You have my thanks.
engSearchText: Heheh. You have my thanks.
jpnChrName: フフ、かたじけない。
jpnSearchText: フフ、かたじけない。

engChrName: I will give you a call once you reach the city.
engSearchText: I will give you a call once you reach the city.
jpnChrName: 現地に着いたあたりで連絡を入れる。
jpnSearchText: 現地に着いたあたりで連絡を入れる。

engChrName: I shall leave a certain other woman in your capable hands as well.
engSearchText:
I shall leave a certain other woman in your capable
hands as well.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんもそうだが ……“あいつ”の方も任せたぞ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんもそうだが
……“あいつ”の方も任せたぞ。

engChrName: *sigh* Always finds a way to saddle me with busywork.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Always finds a way to saddle me
with busywork.
jpnChrName: ったく、勝手なことを……
jpnSearchText: ったく、勝手なことを……

engChrName: Anyway, that president is sure somethin'. Definitely has the looks for the part...
engSearchText:
Anyway, that president is sure somethin'.
Definitely has the looks for the part...
jpnChrName: ま、思った以上にイケオジで 大した眼力とオーラだったが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、思った以上にイケオジで
大した眼力とオーラだったが……

engChrName: ...but he sure doesn't wear his heart on his sleeve. The guy clearly cares about you, but he just won't come out and say it.
engSearchText:
...but he sure doesn't wear his heart on his sleeve.
The guy clearly cares about you, but he just won't
come out and say it.
jpnChrName: 娘相手にもあのツンデレぶり── なかなか難儀そうな親父さんだな？
jpnSearchText:
娘相手にもあのツンデレぶり──
なかなか難儀そうな親父さんだな？
ぁ……

engChrName: Heehee. Well, he is a politician at heart. Evading direct answers is what they're good at.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Well, he is a politician at heart.
Evading direct answers is what they're good at.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… はい、本当にそうなんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
はい、本当にそうなんです。

engChrName: Darn it! I had so many arguments prepared, but now they've been blown out of the water!
engSearchText:
Darn it! I had so many arguments prepared, but now
they've been blown out of the water!
jpnChrName: ああもう、なんかおじさんに 全部持っていかれちゃったけど……！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、なんかおじさんに
全部持っていかれちゃったけど……！

engChrName: Just come back to me safely, all right?
engSearchText: Just come back to me safely, all right?
jpnChrName: とにかく無事に戻ってきなさいよ！？
jpnSearchText: とにかく無事に戻ってきなさいよ！？

engChrName: Will do!
engSearchText: Will do!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: If anything does happen, just give us a ring, and we'll be there before you know it.
engSearchText:
If anything does happen, just give us a ring, and we'll
be there before you know it.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが何かあったら 僕たちも現地に押し掛けるからな！？
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが何かあったら
僕たちも現地に押し掛けるからな！？

engChrName: Until then...please look after our friend.
engSearchText: Until then...please look after our friend.
jpnChrName: アンタらも── 僕たちの幼馴染みを頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
アンタらも──
僕たちの幼馴染みを頼んだぞ！

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: モチロンですっ！
jpnSearchText: モチロンですっ！

engChrName: Yeah—you got it.
engSearchText: Yeah—you got it.
jpnChrName: ああ──任せときな。
jpnSearchText: ああ──任せときな。
